product_overview: LIC Insurance Management System is a comprehensive web application designed to manage the complete life insurance lifecycle for LIC agents, administrators, and customers. It streamlines operations ranging from customer onboarding and policy creation to claims processing and commission tracking with a secure, role-based access controlled environment.
core_goals: Enable seamless customer onboarding with full KYC compliance.
Provide robust policy management including creation, premium calculation, and digital signing.
Facilitate efficient claims processing with real-time status tracking and multi-level approval.
Ensure secure and flexible payment processing with multiple payment modes and premium reminders.
Deliver comprehensive analytics and reporting to track business performance.
Manage agents effectively with performance tracking and commission management.
Offer a modern, accessible, and responsive UI with smooth user experience and dark mode support.
Implement strong security measures including authentication, authorization, data encryption, and audit logging.
key_features: Customer Management: digital KYC, profile management, document handling, and notification system.
Policy Management: multi-step policy creation, premium calculator, document generation with PDF export, digital signature integration.
Claims Management: easy claim registration, real-time status updates, document management, and approval workflows.
Payment & Collections: secure online payments, payment history, automated reminders, and support for multiple payment methods.
Agent Management: agent profile management, commission tracking, performance analytics, and target tracking.
Dashboard: real-time analytics with business metrics, revenue tracking, agent leaderboard, and AI insights.
Notifications: system alerts, messaging, and user communication integration.
Security: Firebase Authentication, role-based access, XSS and CSRF protection, data validation, and secure file uploads.
UI/UX Highlights: modern design system with accessible components, dark mode, responsive layouts, smooth animations, and clear feedback mechanisms.
user_flow_summary: User Registration and Authentication flow including email verification and password reset with OTP support.
Customer Onboarding with multi-step KYC form submission, document upload, and profile creation.
Policy Creation flow enabling policy selection, nominee entry, medical info submission, premium calculation, digital signature, and policy PDF generation.
Claims Processing workflow covering claim registration, document upload, multi-level approval, and status notifications.
Payment and Collections flow allowing users to make payments, view payment history, and receive premium reminders.
Agent Management flow tracking agent profiles, commissions, sales targets, and performance metrics.
Dashboard interaction delivering at-a-glance business metrics, agent leaderboard, claims statistics, and news updates.
Settings and Help access for configuration, user preferences, and support documentation.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration and secure authentication with email verification and OTP processes.
Accurate premium calculations and multi-step validation in policy creation forms.
Document upload and management functionalities performing securely and reliably.
Real-time updates and status tracking in claims and payments processes.
Correct computation and display of agent commissions and dashboard metrics.
Notifications sent and received as per triggered system events.
Responsive UI rendering properly across supported browsers and devices with all accessibility standards met.
Security validations including role-based access, data encryption, and prevention of common web vulnerabilities.
Performance benchmarks including page load times, API response times, and resource usage within acceptable thresholds.
Comprehensive test coverage encompassing unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end workflows.
